required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study of Clinical Non-inferiority of Actparin® (Laboratorio Bergamo) Compared to Heparin Sodium (APP Pharmaceuticals), in Patients With Chronic Renal Failure
clinical_study.official_title: Study of Clinical Non-inferiority of Actparin® (Laboratorio Bergamo) Compared to Heparin Sodium (APP Pharmaceuticals), in Patients With Chronic Renal Failure

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to investigate clinical non-inferiority, pharmacodynamic effect and safety of Actparin® (heparin sodium - Laboratório Químico Farmacêutico Bergamo Ltd.) compared to Heparin Sodium (APP Pharmaceuticals) in patients with renal failure under hemodialysis treatment.

primary_outcome.measure: Effectiveness in prevention of clotting in the extracorporeal circuit during hemodialysis

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacodynamic activity of heparin observed through aPTT marker
Safety in use of heparin by monitoring adverse events
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 5 weeks (12 consecutive sessions + 1 post treatment session)
